body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping             Eating & Sleeping       There are no food, services or camping at Manzanar, however Lone Pine 8 miles south and Independence 6 miles north has food and lodging. Throughout the Eastern Sierra there are a number of campgrounds and RV parks.
